section.title: More information
section.lines: The generated manifest include a single reference in the Class-Path section to all.jar. This jar is generated during the installation of OCS and references all other jars. Therefore the classpath of the generated jar is very simple to generate as the logic is applied during the OCS installation. Note: this cartridge is available also available for API (Domain) as they are packaged in a separate jar.

section.title: Technologies
section.lines: The manifest is generated using the Manifest class of the java.util.jar

section.title: Where to find what
section.p:
The plugin containing the cartridge:
Plugin id: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation
Main class: com.odcgroup.mdf.generation.ManifestGenerator
